Watch: Israeli 'bunker buster' bombs used in Gaza hospital strike, experts sayCCTV footage obtained and verified by the BBC shows the moment before impact and the immediate aftermath. Munitions experts told BBC Verify that the strikes and destruction are consistent with the use of so-called "bunker buster" bombs - designed to hit underground targets.
